author: Special Correspondent
text:
A seminar on labour laws and cost auditing was conducted by the Madurai chapter of the Institute of Company Secretaries of India on Saturday.

In his inaugural address, P. Rajavel, chairman of Madurai chapter, insisted on the need for legal compliance with labour laws which had undergone many amendments in the recent past.

G. Venkataraman, advocate, spoke on the latest amendments to the Provident Fund Act and Industrial Disputes Act and K. V. Om Prakash delivered a lecture on the latest amendments to the Payment of Bonus Act.

Sessions were also held on standards on cost auditing by P. Raju Iyer, and 5s practice by B. Balakrishnan.

S. Jeyaraj proposed a vote of thanks.
title: Seminar on labour laws
